events.body: The backport of https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/a4118c6e200e02e7560f8bc213697aa2909d95b1 here needs to be slightly different also. I've got a version you can pull in here: https://github.com/fanquake/bitcoin/commit/5d5cf12738d04f9212d3108f5afc5686fd361bad.
Thanks, ci macos cross build is green now

Rebased-From: fa2c2b50d895ff3402b82ce3db69bfc43053b519

[doc] Add permissions to the getpeerinfo help.

This field was already being returned, but the RPCHelpMan did not indicate
this. So, this PR updates the help text to match.
